svg.text: Scalar vs Tensor Gravity — Why It Matters
PDTP's current scalar field vs Einstein's full metric tensor
One number at every point in space
Each point stores ONE number: "how strong is gravity here?"
Darker = stronger field. But NO direction information.
A 4×4 matrix at every point in space
How a passing gravitational wave deforms a ring of particles
Like a balloon inflating and deflating
Squeezes one axis, stretches the other
Like squeezing a rubber ball sideways
